description:
Nami enters the mist on a mission to save her mates - and maybe hunt for treasure while she`s at it. The local mayor wants her dead, but the Straw Hats are being protected by a mysterious marine.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Inevitable Melee! Wetton`s Schemes and the Rainbow Tower
Bataille générale ! Le plan de Wetton et la Tour Arc-en-ciel !
Ransen Hisshi! Wetton no Yabou to Niji no Tou
Scontro in vista: Wetton raggiunge la nebbia color arcobaleno
Яростная схватка! Планы Вэттона и Радужная башня!
اشتباكٌ محتوم! مخطّطات ويتّون وبرج قوس قزح!
สู้กันสุดฤทธิ์ ตวามทะเยอะทะยานของวันตั้นและหอคอยสีรุ้ง
乱戦必死! ウェットンの野望と虹の塔
